column2:
ggplot(fisman_miguel) +
  geom_point(aes(x = corruption, y = log(violations))) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x = corruption, y = log(violations)), 
              se = F, method = "loess") +
  geom_text_repel(aes(x = corruption, y = log(violations), label = code)) +
  facet_wrap(~post) +
  theme_bw()
